LanguageData.Door.label: door
LanguageData.Door.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Door.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Door.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Autodoor.label: autodoor
LanguageData.Autodoor.description: Divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Autodoor.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Autodoor.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Wall.label: wall
LanguageData.Wall.description: An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Wall.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Wall.label: FrameLabelExtra
